headline: Ford Motor adds to record it is embarrassed to hold
summary: Ford has had a record-setting 2025 in the absolute worst way. The Blue Oval surpassed General Motors’ 11-year recall record when it issued its 78th recall of the year, Kelley Blue Book reported. Ford had issued 89 recalls by June. 2024: 2.08 million vehicles sold, +4.2%2023: 1.99 ...
